title: LF> active ranked team
body:
Hi. I'm "Ton chan", and I usually play adc(tristana, jinx, lucian, corki, caitlyn, kogmaw), mid,(viktor, azir, yasuo, talon) and jungle (mostly devourer jungler, jarvan, reksai). I could go to any lane but I dont really perfer top. Add me to "Ton chan" or put the comment below to invite! 
I am able to use skype, but it could be bit loud sometimes.

replies.body: Are you still looking for a team? if yes then if you wish add me and we can talk about a position and schedule :)

ProudLosers Hey um if you're still recruiting could i join?
Rank: S5
IGN: UnseenBlade
Main Roles: Jg (Lee Sin/Udyr)  Top (Rengar) 
Age: 15
i can play any role but i perfer those roles {{item:2054}}
